Arslan Shaikh and his fellow co-owners at Happy Rolls ice cream bar in Wellington West opened a couple of weeks ago with their unique ice cream. All natural, featuring just a few ingredients and made by hand on frozen slabs, these ice cream rolls are fairly new to the capital but originated in Thailand and Asia and are now popular around the world.
